listitem.simpara: Domain controller slaves are not registered as authoritative DNS servers for their DNS forward/reverse zones anymore. They are still valid DNS resolvers for clients. This greatly reduced the response size of queries for authoritative DNS servers (39384).
The attribute uidNumber can now be accessed by teachers, staff and school administrators in temporary objects container. This is required to create working groups (39984).
LDAP ACLs are now installed domain wide using the LDAP ACL extension mechanism. Backup domain controllers will now use the registered ACLs without having the UCS@school app installed (40124).

During the update and on new installations the Samba4 Connector will be configured to sync group objects unidirectional from LDAP to Samba4 by setting the UCR variable connector/s4/mapping/group/syncmode=write. Otherwise in some situations inconsistencies and data loss may occur for group memberships (40206).

The number of squid's helper processes (basic auth, NTLM auth, krb5 auth) has been increased to 50 if the UCR value has not been changed manually. Additionally the number of rewrite processes will be increased to 20. This is done by changing the UCR variables squid/.../children (Bug 40091).
When stopping the exam mode, the attribute memberUid for computers at the exam group OU${OU}-Klassenarbeit is now handled correctly (39600).
